attributes.action: Highlight terrible injustice of Sir Anthony Charles Lynton Blair, being, Sir!
attributes.additional_details:
Just. Do right thing. How repugnant, the Old Boys Chumocracy, offer a man so reviled in by British public, be honoured and made a Knight of Garter, highest Civilain honour bestowed by her majesty, yet a man deserving such a George” Johnny” Johnson, yet again be forgotten. Why? How?
It’s immoral, bankrupt, without human decency. He’s 100 for Christ sake. He fully deserves to be a Sir.
attributes.background: How can last surfing member, of Famous Dam Buster Squadron, George “ Johnny” Johnson be over looked yet again. A true and deserving hero if there was one.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for someone to be given an honour, as there is a separate process for that, or for an honour to be removed.

Members of the public can nominate someone for an honour. You can find out how to nominate to do so here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
